description: This file defines data models related to filtering preferences, including classes for representing numeric ranges and filter criteria with enums for demographic attributes.

classes.name: Range
classes.description: Immutable class representing a numeric range with minimum and maximum values.

classes.name: FilterCriteria
classes.description: Immutable class encapsulating various filter options such as height, weight, race, hair color, and religion.

methods.name: Range.copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Range object with optional new min or max values.

methods.name: Range.operator ==
methods.description: Checks for equality between two Range instances.

methods.name: Range.hashCode
methods.description: Generates a hash code for the Range object.

methods.name: Range.toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the Range.

methods.name: FilterCriteria.copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the FilterCriteria with optional new attribute values.

methods.name: FilterCriteria.operator ==
methods.description: Checks for equality between two FilterCriteria instances, comparing ranges and sets.

methods.name: FilterCriteria.hashCode
methods.description: Generates a hash code for the FilterCriteria object.

methods.name: FilterCriteria.toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the FilterCriteria.
